name: Bubishoni
description:
Objective:

Eat the food while avoiding the enemies.

Controls:
  • Move Player 1 with arrow keys.
  • Move Player 2 with w, a, s, d.
  • Toggle music on/off with F12 key.
  • Tolggle mouse movement for Player 1 with F9 key.
Scoring:

For every dot you eat, you get 10 points.

In single player mode you get 3000 bonus points for every level you complete.

In multiplayer mode, upon the completition of level, player who has collected more points gets bonus of 3000 points. If both players collect the same amount of food, they get both 1500 bonus points.
